import React ,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useParams, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, Form, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {listProductsDetails} from '../actions/productActions' function ProductScreen() { const [qty, setqty] = useState(1); const navigate = useNavigate(); const match = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductsDetails(match.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const addToCartHandler = () => { navigate(`/cart/${match.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return (
Go back { loading ? : error ? {error} :(

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ?'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 &&( Qty setqty(e.target.value)} > { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( )) } )} ) }
) } export default ProductScreen
